events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer role from the candidate and confirmed all necessary documents are included.
The candidate's profile matches the requirements for the developer position and has been categorized under Engineering for further processing.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to handle the candidate's application and next steps.
Initial screening call was conducted to assess the candidate's experience with software development and DevOps practices.
The candidate responded promptly expressing strong interest and availability for a technical interview next week.
Technical interview with the lead software engineer scheduled for May 15 at 10 AM UTC to evaluate coding skills and systems design.
